summary: SummaryLancôme Hydra Zen Cream is a hydrating moisturizer that hydrates the skin for up to 48 hours* and delivers skin soothing ingredients to leave skin feeling nourished and visibly more radiant, even, and plump. Best for normal and dry skin types, including sensitive.
details: DetailsFeaturesIntense Hydration: Quenches your skin's thirst, leaving it feeling soft, supple, and moisturized for up to 48 hours*.Stronger Skin Moisture Barrier: helps to strengthen the skin's moisture barrier, preventing moisture loss and protecting it from environmental stressors.Radiant and Even Skin Tone: Visibly improves skin tone and radiance, reducing dullness and unevenness for a brighter, more luminous complexion.Soothing Relief: helps to calm and soothe sensitive skin, visibly reducing redness for a more comfortable and healthy-looking appearance.Gentle Formula: Dermatologist-tested and suitable for all skin types, including sensitive, to provide hydration without irritation.*Clinical test with 28 women after 48 hoursResearch ResultsSkin is smoother +30%Skin is more radiant +25%Skin tone is more even +24%*Based on a 4-week clinical study of 79 womenAfter 1 Week: 100% agree skin feels nourished and hydrated. • 98% agree skin feels smootherAfter 1 Week: 98% agree skin feels smootherAfter 1 Week: 97% agree skin feels soothedAfter 4 Weeks: 98% agree skin looks more radiant. 96% agree skin complexion looks fresherKey IngredientsHyaluronic Acid: A powerful humectant that is known to provide intense hydration and plumping the skin.Bisabolol: known to protect against environmental aggressors and free radical damage, while soothing the skinNatural-Origin Centifolia Rose Extract: known to provide moisture to the skinFormulated without Mineral Oil, Parabens, Silicones, or Phthalates. Derived from 90% natural origin ingredients.*Lancôme considers an ingredient to be naturally derived if it is unchanged from its natural state or has undergone processing yet still retains greater than 50% of its molecular structure from its original natural sourceItem 2630780How To UseUse this hydrating moisturizer daily, in the morning and at night, after cleansing and applying your face serum.HOW TO USE:Apply a dime-sized amount of the hydrating moisturizer onto the face & neck and massage into the skin until absorbed.Follow with your eye care and/or makeup routine.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: No good
reviews.comments: Left my face greasy and breaking out.

reviews.headline: My favorite face cream!
reviews.comments: Hydra Zen has the perfect balance - not too heavy, not greasy, very moisturizing.  Has a beautiful rose scent!

reviews.headline: Perfect face cream - wrong size listed
reviews.comments:
This face cream is wonderful for my sensitive combination skin! It makes my face feel baby-soft the morning after use. It does smell like roses, which I happen to love - but if fragrance in skin care bothers you, be aware of that! 

  Like another reviewer said, the size listed on the site is incorrect. It is listed as 2.6oz but the container I received is 1.69oz. Hopefully Ulta corrects this!

reviews.headline: Wrong size listed
reviews.comments: You would think Ulta would advertise correctly— I purchased it as 2.6 size— of course its 1.7 .. most large creams are 1.7–get it right
